------------------------------------------------------
Summary - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------
Title : Grave Reloaded
Level Name : Surf Grave Reloaded
Filename : surf_grave_reloaded
Version : 2.6
Release Date : 06/07/2007
Author : Xblah
Email Address : changremista@gmail.com
Web Site : http://www.xblahleveldesigns.tripod.com

------------------------------------------------------
Comments - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------

This is a complete remake of the original Counter-Strike: Source Surf Grave Final. Betweeen the many changes are:

Added Displacements
Added Lights
Added Details

------------------------------------------------------
Servers Running - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------

TOMB: 85.14.216.193:27016
X-Devs.com: 69.9.45.210:27015

------------------------------------------------------
Installing - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------

To install the map, open the .zip file and extract all
the files to the directory: ...\cstrike\maps\

------------------------------------------------------
In Game Configuration - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------

Surf Maps need some diferent configurations. It's the
case of this map. To surf on it, you have to write the
following sentences in the console of your mod:

sv_airaccelerate 100  //For Surfing
net_maxfilesize 20    //For Allow Downloading the Map

------------------------------------------------------
Details - Surf Grave Reloaded
------------------------------------------------------
Game : Counter-Strike: Source
Type : Surf - Bomb Defusing
Recommended Players : 2-64
Mods : CS:S
Description : ---
Known Bugs : None
Construction Time : 2 Months
Editor Used : Hammer WE 4.0
Base Textures : De Cbble
